Class: PressEmitter

PressEmitter

new PressEmitter(options)

Gesture emitter that monitors a single element for press (long-touch/hold) events.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
options Object Additional options
Properties
Name Type Argument Default Description
emitter Emitter | Object <optional>
<nullable>
 {} Emitter instance or options on which to emit events
element Element Element for which to bind events
hammer Hammer Hammer instance for the element (required by base class)
enabled boolean <optional>
<nullable>
 false Whether to enable this emitter
Source:
  • ui/pressemitter.js, line 16

Extends

  • GestureEmitter

defaultOptions

Default options
Source:

enabled

Indicates if this emitter is enabled (listens for events, and forwards them on the Emitter)

Events

gesture:press

Event for a press (long-touch/hold) gesture.
Type:
  • DecksEvent
Properties:
Name Type Description
type String The event type string
sender PressEmitter The PressEmitter instance sending the event.
data * The Hammer.js press event object.
